name: prideful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
disapproving proud in a way that shows you think you are better or more important than other people: He's just so smug and prideful. Here are two suggestions for avoiding or abandoning a prideful attitude.
feeling pleasure and satisfaction because you or people connected with you have done or got something good: I'm very prideful about my school. Synonym
proud (SATISFIED)
More examplesFewer examplesHe's never cocky or prideful.Some people are so prideful they can't stand being corrected.I used to feel like if I hung my diplomas, it was too prideful.His greatest fear is being embarrassed - he's very prideful.
